1.<%sPC_NAME_1>さん。私のせいで ご迷惑を\nおかけして ごめんなさい:
<%sPC_NAME_1>. I am sorry for the
trouble I have caused you. Until now, I
have lived my life keeping my past a
secret. But I thought that you would
treat me the same even if you knew my
past, so I made the decision to confide
in you. I'm really glad to have met you.

195.よう！ あらためて 礼を言わせてくれ。\nピンチを救ってくれたことも そうだけど:
Hey! I just wanted to thank you again.
Not only for saving my life, but also
for accepting my decision to join the
SCC to help my brother. That's really
important to me, so I was very happy to
hear that... Thanks. Let's keep working
hard for the SCC!

395.<%sPC_NAME_1>ってさ ホント なんなの？\n魔族だって知ったのに 助:
What's with <%sPC_NAME_1>, really?
What's so important about me that you
came to save me even after you found out
I'm a demon? I've observed a lot of
people in my life, but I've never seen
anyone as weird as you. Well, it's
convenient for me, so keep being you.

588.いっぱい いっぱい ありがとう。\n\nこれからも ずっと いっしょ！\n\n\:
Thank you so so much.

We'll always be together from now on.


I love you.

645.迷惑をかけちまって 本当にすまねえ。\n今 手紙を書くような 気分じゃないが\n:
I'm so sorry for the trouble I've causedyou. I'm not in the mood to write you a
letter right now, but I really wanted totell you how I feel. I don't know what
the future holds, but I know I can get
through it with you. Thanks for coming
to the terrace that time. <%sPC_NAME_1>.

836.<%sPC_NAME_1>。この前は ありがとうな。\n俺が お前の恋人に なれ:
<%sPC_NAME_1>. Thanks for the other day.I still feel like I'm dreaming that I
can be your lover. We'll always be
together. Thank you. <pc>.

951.ごきげんよう <%sPC_NAME_1>さん。\nあなたが 真実の愛を知った記念:
Good day, <%sPC_NAME_1>. I'd like to
give you a small gift to commemorate
your discovery of true love. For more
information, come to the home economics
room on the third floor of the first
building... Please visit when you can.
           From Love Deliverer, Sugarmel

1136.あなたにかけた カモフラージュの\n魔法のことで 伝え忘れたことがあるの。\n申:
I forgot to tell you about the
camouflage spell I cast on you. I'm
sorry, but if you need more information,please ask Mr. Revaivah in the staff
room.
            From Admissions Guide Flasse

1293.面と向かって 言うのが\nテレくさいから 手紙を書くよ。\n僕が 過去の呪縛から:
I was too shy to say it face-to-face, soI'm writing you this letter. It's thanksto you that I have been freed from the
spell of the past. I will report at my
mother's grave that I have made a
wonderful friend. Thank you so much for
coming to this school.

1460.<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>へ。あたしがフウキに\n:
To <%sCMP_CRO_PSN><%sPC_NAME_1>.
Thanks for giving me the chance to come
back to the SCC. It was because of you Ifinally had the courage to stand up to
Sinazitch at the last minute. I can
finally tell my family that I'm a free
man. I hope I can help you someday...

1654.<%sPC_NAME_1> 俺の告白を\n受け入れてくれて 本当にありがとう。\:
<%sPC_NAME_1>, thank you so much for
accepting my confession. I'm glad I had
the courage to tell you how I felt. I'm
the luckiest person in the world to be
able to go out with <%sPC_NAME_1>. From
now on, let's make lots of memories
together.

1815.<%sPC_NAME_1>に 出会うまでは\nまさか ここまで夢中になれる人間が:
Until I met you <%sPC_NAME_1>, I never
thought there was anyone in the world I
could be so crazy about. As I promised
you last night, you are my eternal
bride. <%sPC_NAME_1>, with the ring of
the pledge I swore my love to you
with...I'll never let you go.

1987.<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>と あたしは\n今日から:
<%sCMP_CRO_PSN><%sPC_NAME_1>, we are going
to be lovers from now on! Tee-hee <heart>
So from now on, please don't be so
formal, and just call me Crown, okay?
Let's get along so well that everyone
gets jealous. <heart>

2138.<%sPC_NAME_1>さん……私 幸せです。\n私のことが好きだと 言ってく:
<%sPC_NAME_1>...I'm happy. I was really,really happy when you told me that you
liked me... I adore you for facing me
with all your might, fighting with me,
and loving me. I may be a novice, but I
will do my best, so please be my friend
for a long time to come.

2335.<%sPC_NAME_1>へ\n\nおヨメさんするは もっとあと。\nけど いっ:
To <%sPC_NAME_1>

I'll become your wife later on. But
let's get along very, very well in the
meantime. <%sPC_NAME_1>, I love you very
much. <heart>
